mapper.sql: ID, DATETIME, STOREY, CON_TEMP1, CON_TEMP2, CON_TEMP3, CON_TEMP4, CON_TEMP5, CON_TEMP6, CON_TEMP7, WATERINLET, WATEROUTLET1, WATEROUTLET2, COLDWATER_TEMP1, COLDWATER_TEMP2, HOTWATER_TEMP1, HOTWATER_TEMP2, ET, FLOW, GUID, CASTINGSTATE, CTSTATUS, JWSL, JWSLB, SWWS, SWWSB, CJWC, CJWCB, LBWC, LBWCB, CTMAX, CTMAXB, INTT_CTMAX, INTT_CTMAXB, PARTS, TEMPCC
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from qqc_mct
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into qqc_mct (ID, DATETIME, STOREY, CON_TEMP1, CON_TEMP2, CON_TEMP3, CON_TEMP4, CON_TEMP5, CON_TEMP6, CON_TEMP7, WATERINLET, WATEROUTLET1, WATEROUTLET2, COLDWATER_TEMP1, COLDWATER_TEMP2, HOTWATER_TEMP1, HOTWATER_TEMP2, ET, FLOW, GUID, CASTINGSTATE, CTSTATUS, JWSL, JWSLB, SWWS, SWWSB, CJWC, CJWCB, LBWC, LBWCB, CTMAX, CTMAXB, INTT_CTMAX, INTT_CTMAXB, PARTS, TEMPCC ) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{datetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{storey,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{conTemp1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{conTemp2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{conTemp3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{conTemp4,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{conTemp5,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{conTemp6,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{conTemp7,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{waterinlet,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{wateroutlet1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{wateroutlet2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{coldwaterTemp1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{coldwaterTemp2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hotwaterTemp1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hotwaterTemp2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{et,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{flow,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{castingstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jwsl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{jwslb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{swws,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{swwsb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cjwc,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cjwcb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lbwc,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lbwcb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctmax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ctmaxb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inttCtmax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{inttCtmaxb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tempcc,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )

mapper.update:
update qqc_mct
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DATETIME = #{record.datetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STOREY = #{record.storey,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CON_TEMP1 = #{record.conTemp1,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CON_TEMP2 = #{record.conTemp2,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CON_TEMP3 = #{record.conTemp3,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CON_TEMP4 = #{record.conTemp4,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CON_TEMP5 = #{record.conTemp5,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CON_TEMP6 = #{record.conTemp6,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CON_TEMP7 = #{record.conTemp7,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WATERINLET = #{record.waterinlet,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WATEROUTLET1 = #{record.wateroutlet1,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WATEROUTLET2 = #{record.wateroutlet2,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COLDWATER_TEMP1 = #{record.coldwaterTemp1,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COLDWATER_TEMP2 = #{record.coldwaterTemp2,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HOTWATER_TEMP1 = #{record.hotwaterTemp1,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HOTWATER_TEMP2 = #{record.hotwaterTemp2,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ET = #{record.et,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FLOW = #{record.flow,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GUID = #{record.guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CASTINGSTATE = #{record.castingstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CTSTATUS = #{record.ctstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JWSL = #{record.jwsl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
JWSLB = #{record.jwslb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SWWS = #{record.swws,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SWWSB = #{record.swwsb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CJWC = #{record.cjwc,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CJWCB = #{record.cjwcb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LBWC = #{record.lbwc,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LBWCB = #{record.lbwcb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CTMAX = #{record.ctmax,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CTMAXB = #{record.ctmaxb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INTT_CTMAX = #{record.inttCtmax,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INTT_CTMAXB = #{record.inttCtmaxb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARTS = #{record.parts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEMPCC = #{record.tempcc,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

update qqc_mct set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DATETIME = #{record.datetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STOREY = #{record.storey,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CON_TEMP1 = #{record.conTemp1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CON_TEMP2 = #{record.conTemp2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CON_TEMP3 = #{record.conTemp3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CON_TEMP4 = #{record.conTemp4,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CON_TEMP5 = #{record.conTemp5,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CON_TEMP6 = #{record.conTemp6,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CON_TEMP7 = #{record.conTemp7,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WATERINLET = #{record.waterinlet,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WATEROUTLET1 = #{record.wateroutlet1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WATEROUTLET2 = #{record.wateroutlet2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COLDWATER_TEMP1 = #{record.coldwaterTemp1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COLDWATER_TEMP2 = #{record.coldwaterTemp2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HOTWATER_TEMP1 = #{record.hotwaterTemp1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HOTWATER_TEMP2 = #{record.hotwaterTemp2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ET = #{record.et,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FLOW = #{record.flow,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, GUID = #{record.guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASTINGSTATE = #{record.castingstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CTSTATUS = #{record.ctstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JWSL = #{record.jwsl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, JWSLB = #{record.jwslb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SWWS = #{record.swws,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SWWSB = #{record.swwsb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CJWC = #{record.cjwc,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CJWCB = #{record.cjwcb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LBWC = #{record.lbwc,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LBWCB = #{record.lbwcb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CTMAX = #{record.ctmax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CTMAXB = #{record.ctmaxb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTT_CTMAX = #{record.inttCtmax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INTT_CTMAXB = #{record.inttCtmaxb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARTS = #{record.parts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEMPCC = #{record.tempcc,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update qqc_mct
DATETIME = #{datetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STOREY = #{storey,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CON_TEMP1 = #{conTemp1,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CON_TEMP2 = #{conTemp2,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CON_TEMP3 = #{conTemp3,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CON_TEMP4 = #{conTemp4,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CON_TEMP5 = #{conTemp5,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CON_TEMP6 = #{conTemp6,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CON_TEMP7 = #{conTemp7,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WATERINLET = #{waterinlet,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WATEROUTLET1 = #{wateroutlet1,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WATEROUTLET2 = #{wateroutlet2,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COLDWATER_TEMP1 = #{coldwaterTemp1,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COLDWATER_TEMP2 = #{coldwaterTemp2,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HOTWATER_TEMP1 = #{hotwaterTemp1,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HOTWATER_TEMP2 = #{hotwaterTemp2,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ET = #{et,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FLOW = #{flow,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GUID = #{guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CASTINGSTATE = #{castingstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CTSTATUS = #{ctstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JWSL = #{jwsl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
JWSLB = #{jwslb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SWWS = #{swws,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SWWSB = #{swwsb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CJWC = #{cjwc,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CJWCB = #{cjwcb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LBWC = #{lbwc,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LBWCB = #{lbwcb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CTMAX = #{ctmax,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CTMAXB = #{ctmaxb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INTT_CTMAX = #{inttCtmax,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INTT_CTMAXB = #{inttCtmaxb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARTS = #{parts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEMPCC = #{tempcc,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update qqc_mct set DATETIME = #{datetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STOREY = #{storey,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CON_TEMP1 = #{conTemp1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CON_TEMP2 = #{conTemp2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CON_TEMP3 = #{conTemp3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CON_TEMP4 = #{conTemp4,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CON_TEMP5 = #{conTemp5,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CON_TEMP6 = #{conTemp6,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CON_TEMP7 = #{conTemp7,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WATERINLET = #{waterinlet,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WATEROUTLET1 = #{wateroutlet1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WATEROUTLET2 = #{wateroutlet2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COLDWATER_TEMP1 = #{coldwaterTemp1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COLDWATER_TEMP2 = #{coldwaterTemp2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HOTWATER_TEMP1 = #{hotwaterTemp1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HOTWATER_TEMP2 = #{hotwaterTemp2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ET = #{et,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FLOW = #{flow,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, GUID = #{guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASTINGSTATE = #{castingstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CTSTATUS = #{ctstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JWSL = #{jwsl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, JWSLB = #{jwslb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SWWS = #{swws,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SWWSB = #{swwsb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CJWC = #{cjwc,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CJWCB = #{cjwcb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LBWC = #{lbwc,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LBWCB = #{lbwcb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CTMAX = #{ctmax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CTMAXB = #{ctmaxb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTT_CTMAX = #{inttCtmax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INTT_CTMAXB = #{inttCtmaxb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARTS = #{parts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEMPCC = #{tempcc,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select guid from QQC_MCT t where PARTS=#{parts} group by t.guid order by max(t.datetime)
select * from QQC_MCT t where guid=#{guid}

SELECT DATETIME,CTSTATUS,CTMAXB STATUS,GREATEST( CASE WHEN CON_TEMP1>250 THEN 0 ELSE CON_TEMP1 END, CASE WHEN CON_TEMP2>250 THEN 0 ELSE CON_TEMP2 END, CASE WHEN CON_TEMP3>250 THEN 0 ELSE CON_TEMP3 END, CASE WHEN CON_TEMP4>250 THEN 0 ELSE CON_TEMP4 END, CASE WHEN CON_TEMP5>250 THEN 0 ELSE CON_TEMP5 END, CASE WHEN CON_TEMP6>250 THEN 0 ELSE CON_TEMP6 END, CASE WHEN CON_TEMP7>250 THEN 0 ELSE CON_TEMP7 END ) PMAX FROM qqc_mct T WHERE STOREY = #{storey} ORDER BY DATETIME;

SELECT t1.*,PMAX-LEAST(A,E,F) TD from ( SELECT DATETIME,CON_TEMP1 A,CON_TEMP5 E,CON_TEMP6 F, GREATEST( CASE WHEN CON_TEMP1>250 THEN 0 ELSE CON_TEMP1 END, CASE WHEN CON_TEMP2>250 THEN 0 ELSE CON_TEMP2 END, CASE WHEN CON_TEMP3>250 THEN 0 ELSE CON_TEMP3 END, CASE WHEN CON_TEMP4>250 THEN 0 ELSE CON_TEMP4 END, CASE WHEN CON_TEMP5>250 THEN 0 ELSE CON_TEMP5 END, CASE WHEN CON_TEMP6>250 THEN 0 ELSE CON_TEMP6 END, CASE WHEN CON_TEMP7>250 THEN 0 ELSE CON_TEMP7 END ) PMAX,CTSTATUS,LBWCB FROM qqc_mct WHERE STOREY = #{storey} ORDER BY DATETIME ) t1;

SELECT t.*,GREATEST( CASE WHEN ABS(t.B)>200 THEN 0 ELSE ABS(t.B) END, CASE WHEN ABS(t.C)>200 THEN 0 ELSE ABS(t.C) END, CASE WHEN ABS(t.D)>200 THEN 0 ELSE ABS(t.D) END, CASE WHEN ABS(t.E)>200 THEN 0 ELSE ABS(t.E) END, CASE WHEN ABS(t.F)>200 THEN 0 ELSE ABS(t.F) END, CASE WHEN ABS(t.G)>200 THEN 0 ELSE ABS(t.G) END, CASE WHEN ABS(t.A)>200 THEN 0 ELSE ABS(t.A) END ) PMAX FROM (SELECT t.DATETIME date, t.CON_TEMP1-t2.CON_TEMP1 A, t.CON_TEMP2-t2.CON_TEMP2 B, t.CON_TEMP3-t2.CON_TEMP3 C, t.CON_TEMP4-t2.CON_TEMP4 D, t.CON_TEMP5-t2.CON_TEMP5 E, t.CON_TEMP6-t2.CON_TEMP6 F, t.CON_TEMP7-t2.CON_TEMP7 G, t.LBWCB STATUS, t.CTSTATUS FROM qqc_mct t LEFT JOIN qqc_mct t2 ON t.GUID = t2.GUID AND t2.STOREY=#{story}+1 WHERE t.STOREY = #{story} ORDER BY t.DATETIME DESC) t

SELECT t.*, GREATEST(ABS(t.INPUT-t.OUTPUT1),ABS(t.INPUT-t.OUTPUT2)) IOMAX FROM (SELECT DATETIME date, WATERINLET INPUT, WATEROUTLET1 OUTPUT1, WATEROUTLET2 OUTPUT2, CTSTATUS, SWWSB STATUS FROM qqc_mct WHERE STOREY=#{storey} ORDER BY DATETIME DESC ) t;

SELECT t.*, GREATEST(ABS(t.A-t.ET),ABS(t.E-t.ET),ABS(t.F-t.ET)) TD FROM ( SELECT DATETIME date, CON_TEMP1 A, CON_TEMP5 E, CON_TEMP6 F, ET, CTSTATUS FROM qqc_mct WHERE STOREY = #{storey} ORDER BY DATETIME DESC ) t;

SELECT *, (t.C-t.PC) TR FROM (SELECT t.DATETIME date, t.CON_TEMP3 C, t.CTSTATUS, t.JWSLB STATUS, t.GUID, (SELECT t2.CON_TEMP3 FROM (SELECT * FROM qqc_mct WHERE id IN( SELECT MIN(id) FROM qqc_mct WHERE DATE_FORMAT(DATETIME,'%H')='00' AND STOREY = #{storey} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(DATETIME,'%Y-%m-%d') ) UNION SELECT * FROM qqc_mct WHERE id IN( SELECT MIN(id) FROM qqc_mct WHERE DATE_FORMAT(DATETIME,'%H')='06' AND STOREY = #{storey} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(DATETIME,'%Y-%m-%d') ) UNION SELECT * FROM qqc_mct WHERE id IN( SELECT MIN(id) FROM qqc_mct WHERE DATE_FORMAT(DATETIME,'%H')='12' AND STOREY = #{storey} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(DATETIME,'%Y-%m-%d') ) UNION SELECT * FROM qqc_mct WHERE id IN( SELECT MIN(id) FROM qqc_mct WHERE DATE_FORMAT(DATETIME,'%H')='18' AND STOREY = #{storey} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(DATETIME,'%Y-%m-%d') )) t2 WHERE t2.DATETIME < t.DATETIME ORDER BY DATETIME DESC LIMIT 1) PC FROM (SELECT * FROM qqc_mct WHERE id IN( SELECT MIN(id) FROM qqc_mct WHERE DATE_FORMAT(DATETIME,'%H')='00' AND STOREY = #{storey} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(DATETIME,'%Y-%m-%d') ) UNION SELECT * FROM qqc_mct WHERE id IN( SELECT MIN(id) FROM qqc_mct WHERE DATE_FORMAT(DATETIME,'%H')='06' AND STOREY = #{storey} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(DATETIME,'%Y-%m-%d') ) UNION SELECT * FROM qqc_mct WHERE id IN( SELECT MIN(id) FROM qqc_mct WHERE DATE_FORMAT(DATETIME,'%H')='12' AND STOREY = #{storey} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(DATETIME,'%Y-%m-%d') ) UNION SELECT * FROM qqc_mct WHERE id IN( SELECT MIN(id) FROM qqc_mct WHERE DATE_FORMAT(DATETIME,'%H')='18' AND STOREY = #{storey} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(DATETIME,'%Y-%m-%d') )) t ORDER BY t.DATETIME DESC)t
